solution_line_template: She signed up {first_day_friends} friends, then an additional {end_week_friends} for a total of {first_day_friends}+{end_week_friends} =<<{first_day_friends}+{end_week_friends}={total_friends}>>{total_friends} friends

And she received ${katrina_per_friend_reward} for each friend so {total_friends}*{katrina_per_friend_reward} = $<<{total_friends}*{katrina_per_friend_reward}={katrina_friends_reward}>>{katrina_friends_reward}

Her initial reward was ${katrina_initial_reward} and her friends made ${total_friends_reward} for signing up and she received ${katrina_friends_reward} when they signed up for a total of {katrina_initial_reward}+{total_friends_reward}+{katrina_friends_reward} = $<<{katrina_initial_reward}+{total_friends_reward}+{katrina_friends_reward}={total_money}>>{total_money}
